title: Foundations of Data Analysis Using Visualization Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Students learn the fundamental principles of visualization recommendation systems and apply them to real-world data to derive insights. The blended environment combines theoretical lectures with hands-on sessions, and in-depth learning is conducted through individual projects.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept and operational principles of visualization recommendation systems
Learners can utilize VRS tools to select appropriate visualization techniques based on data characteristics
Learners can critically evaluate generated visualizations and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
